Title: Operation Avalanche (2016 Movie) - Official Trailer
Comment:
The plot is the CIA pulls one over on the the world because NASA can't land on the moon, so the CIA step in and fake it on NASA's behalf, with only the astronauts and a few of the NASA chiefs being in on it with the CIA agents assigned to the task.
The funny thing is, it portrays the CIA as the good guys. That is funny! Rather than the government pulling off the greatest hoax of all time, the CIA are painted in a good light, doing the USA a favour and giving the public a good show and beating the Ruskies to it.
"Conspiracy theorists" are gently parodied and besmirched, real false flags are injected (Operation northwoods) but misrepresented. It is interesting that they honestly admit that telemetry of previous moon landing simulations could have been used to fake a landing without anyone knowing.
I do think this film is a CIA psy-op to embed in peoples imagination that its just a fanciful while plausible story, with no real proof it was faked other than it can't be proved it was real. My personal opinion is the moon landing and journey to moon has been explored and debunked by so many intelligent people it is beyond doubt it was a hoax, of some kind, on a large scale. Things like pictures of earth from the capsule being altered, 'eye-witness' testimony of the men on moon perceiving earth rise to be quite small (it would be 4 times bigger than a moon rise), no real conviction in their words, the obvious notion they had everything already created and simulated on earth for a fake moon landing, perfect exposures of the pictures, no irradiation effects from van allen belt, obviously staged footage of lem lifting off from moon, etc.
Its a good film, but it has some sublayers which are trying to shape the general populations impression of any seriously presented conspiracy theories that 'we never went to the moon being just theory; its a story which we will never know the truth of.'
Watch and enjoy, but be aware.
For an alternative perspective try this and se if you still thing its theory:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wfTapJhp_Qw

Title: Operation Avalanche (2016 Movie) - Official Trailer
Comment:
well all the bloody idiots that dont believe in te here you go 


apollo astronauts, and astronauts in the upcoming visits to the Moon, will have to travel through
some of these belt regions because the orbit of the Moon lies along the fastest line-of-travel from Earth.
On the scale of the above figure, the distance to the Moon is 60 Re.
1. The speed of the spacecraft will be about 25,000 km/hour. If the spacecraft travels along the
indicated path, how long, in minutes, will it spend in the Blue, Green, Yellow, Orange and Red regions?
 Note: transit estimates may vary depending on how accurately students measure figure.
 Blue: 1.8 Re x (6378 km/Re) x (1 hour/25,000 km) x (60 minutes/1 hour) = 27.6 minutes
 Yellow: (1.4 x 6378) /25,000 x 60 = 6.1 minutes
 Orange: (1.0 x 6378) / 25,000 x 60 = 15.3 minutes
 Green: (0.25 x 6378)/25,000 x 60 = 3.8 minutes
 Red: 0 minutes
 Total transit time……………………… 52.8 minutes
2. Given the indicated radiation dosages in Rads/sec for each zone, what will be the dosages that the
astronauts receive in each zone?
 Blue: = 27.6 minutes x ( 60 sec/ 1 minute) x (0.0001 Rads/sec) = 0.17 Rads
 Yellow = 6.1 minutes x 60 sec/minute x 0.005 rads/sec = 1.83 Rads
 Orange = 15.3 minutes x (60 sec/minute) x 0.01 rads/sec = 9.18 Rads
 Green = 3.8 minutes x (60 sec/minute) x 0.001 rads/sec = 0.23 Rads
3. What will be the total radiation dosage in Rads for the transit through the belts?
 0.17 + 1.83 + 9.18 + 0.23 = 11.4 Rads
4. Some people believe that the Apollo moon landings were a hoax because astronauts would have
been instantly killed in the radiation belts. According to the US Occupation Safety and Health Agency
(OSHA) a lethal radiation dosage is 300 Rads in one hour. What is your answer to the 'moon landing
hoax' believers?
Note: According to radiation dosimeters carried by Apollo astronauts, their total dosage for the entire trip to the moon and return
was not more than 2 Rads over 6 days.
The total dosage for the trip is only 11.4 Rads in 52.8 minutes. Because 52.8 minutes is equal to 0.88
hours, his is equal to a dosage of 11.4 Rads / 0.88 hours = 13 Rads in one hour, which is well below
the 300 Rads in one hour that is considered to be lethal.
Also, this radiation exposure would be for an astronaut outside the spacecraft during the transit through
the belts. The radiation shielding inside the spacecraft cuts down the 13 Rads/hour exposure so that it is
completely harmless.

Here is my perspective of it from all evidence I personally gained from reseaching this subject.

We did go to the moon with the Apollo missions. (Many times actually. And many of the missions were completely kept secret all together from the public.)
But, because of what they experienced and found there they decided that they would absolutely not make the video public.
Therefore they also made a fake  moon landing film that they could show openly to the public. 
And that fake movie is what so many people today think is the only "moon landing" video that exists.
Dig deeper and you will find the bigger truth. 
(And also, don't forget to reseach "The Secret Space Program" if you want even bigger space journeys we are doing right now, and have done, for many decades.)

Take care guys!

Title: Operation Avalanche (2016 Movie) - Official Trailer
Comment:
For those of us who have looked for ourselves and have a working knowledge of the physical sciences, a new film that shows the Apollo landings were fake really isn't very different to a new film that shows that Santa isn't real.
 If an adult has always believed with certainty that the Moon landings were real then no amount of logical reasoning will persuade them otherwise, unless they first change their view of how the human world works generally.
What will play out is that any child who looks into the Moon landing (without a lifetime of conditioning to believe in them), from a relatively neutral standpoint, or anyone else with a relatively open mind, will quickly see it was faked, and that knowledge will go towards their view of how the world really works, and that can't be anything but a good thing if human consciousness is to evolve.
...Hopefully
